messages.message:
Hi. Are there considerations for - or is it possible to - exposing extraction confidence scores at a more granular level than field?
> Here, a Paychex use case looks to extract employee information, with associated attributes. 
> Today in the enterprise platform they particularly noted the use of more granular metadata for confidence scoring, and in turn validations - whereas with AI Hub, it would almost be the whole employee list needs to be reviewed (a list could be up to 600+ employees).
@diana.rodolico, @JD, any further context from the call today?
I think that's great context, Tom.   They basically want scores associated to individual elements within a list.

@Tom Murphy we don't have plans for now, but please submit a new feature ticket for this (cc: @Kaustubh (KD)).

Validations are per field so if there is information they need to validate separately, we'd encourage them to use a separate field for each piece of info they want to independently review.
